titulo: Pre-commercial appraisal for CO2 aquifer storage
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to the following outcome:Support pre-commercial CO2 geological storage appraisal, speed up storage site development, support planning of CO2 capture projects (and related source to store linkages), and help closing the storage capacity gap, in particular in Central, Eastern and Southern Europe. Scope:Carry out a storage site identification and appraisal programme including at least one injection pilot test in a deep saline aquifer. Inje
